description: New in this version: Directions to property, New Advanced Search Options (including Listing Number search), bug fixes (searching rentals.) Use your cell phone to stay on top of the market with Real Estate by Smarter Agent. Whether you’re buying, renting, selling or just curious, this app includes three GPS-triggered real estate searches that provide all the information and pictures you want at your fingertips. This is Version 1.2 for Palm devices—even more features coming soon! The "Call to See" button offers real time access to a real estate professional if you have questions or want to schedule a tour of the property. Unique to Smarter Agent: If you see the "Broker Reciprocity" logo at the bottom of the data, you are seeing every public MLS listing in that area. Smarter Agent partners with local brokers and agents to gain access not only to their listings but to all listings in that market via a national MLS program called Broker Reciprocity/IDX. If you do not see the "Broker Reciprocity" logo, you will see about 25% of the available listings coming directly from feeds we get from major real estate firms.
